     DESCRIPTION:

    This secret agent is armed and extremely dangerous. He - the only defense of democracy against criminal syndicates and mad leaders of developing countries. He has the most beautiful co-worker and the most deadly invention ever created in the laboratories of Mi6. His name is Bond. James Bond. And only he can perform tasks that change the world.

    007 Legends New game allows all Bond fans survive the most significant moments of his career. The game's plot is based on the six Hollywood blockbusters about the adventures of the most popular in the world of a secret agent, including the new film "007: Coordinates" Skayfoll. " Use the unique spy gear, arrange clever driving cars and destroy the insidious designs of enemies with an impressive arsenal of different weapons. The enemies know how to kill, but you can not compare them, you are waiting for combat skills and techniques, breathtaking special effects ... and of course, the beauty that became hallmark 007!

     GAME FEATURES:

" Break open safes and computers to gain access to classified information and documents;
" Experience the exciting chases and fierce firefight in a unique style 007,
" Use the iconic cars, gadgets and secret weapon for successful completion of tasks;
" Take part in missions protection, destruction and espionage in single and cooperative play,
" Prove to your friends and acquaintances that you are the best agent in the campaign and in multiplayer game on one screen.
